content:
This thread will host the conversation around this track.
Confluence Page: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2020-05+Security+Labeling+Track
Github Repo: https://github.com/mojitoj/hl7-fhir-connectathon-may2020-sec-labeling-track

Hi,
I just registered for the connectathon. Is there any instruction on how to join the video conference for this track? Thanks!
@Xiao Yang the instructions will be posted in the morning on Wednesday.

From the Connectathon organizers' email:

Amazon Web Services is providing $100 credit codes to all participants that would like to use AWS tools as a way to support HL7 FHIR! Click here to claim your credit
@Xiao Yang et al. To make sure you will receive the zoom details for the track please fill in the connectathon survey and select the security labeling track :https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/HNQ96MY
Thanks, Mohammad. Just saw your msg and filled out the survey.
